授業目的:
To enhance students' ability in critical analysis on regional approach and transnational policy framework for socio-economic and spatial development.
Students learn the skills and concepts to analyze regional development issues and policies in this course.
THE COURSE WILL BE HELD FACE-to-FACE. But it might take the ON-DEMAND Learning when COVID_19 problems continue. Please Check with the LUNA
到達目標:
Specific case studies on Urban Infrastructure in Europe and Asia will be illustrated, discussed and analyzed by students
- aiming that Students can make critical assessment / recommendation for development policy and UN programs.
Students can analyze regional development issues and policies in this course
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
